channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 05:33 Air anxiety in the Nikolaev area follow further reports.
item.description: 游댮 05:33 Air anxiety in the Nikolaev area follow further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 05:28 Drive alarm to the Zolotonsky district.Creck on subsequent messages.
